thread.title: British OAP, 86, arrested on suspicion of stabbing wife, 79, to death at Costa Blanca retirement home
thread.title_full: British OAP, 86, arrested on suspicion of stabbing wife, 79, to death at Costa Blanca retirement home

author: Gerard Couzens
title: British OAP, 86, arrested on suspicion of stabbing wife, 79, to death at Costa Blanca retirement home
text:
News British OAP, 86, arrested on suspicion of stabbing wife, 79, to death at Costa Blanca retirement home The unnamed British victim died at around 8.30am in El Campello near Alicante - and paramedics took the suspect away by ambulance after he reportedly tried to harm himself Share A 79-year-old British woman was stabbed to death on the Costa Blanca (Photo: SOLARPIX.COM) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
A British pensioner has been arrested on suspicion of stabbing his wife to death at a retirement home on the Costa Blanca. 
The 79-year-old unnamed victim - who was also British - died at around 8.30am this morning in the town of El Campello near Alicante. 
Paramedics are reported to have taken the 86-year-old unnamed suspect away by ambulance after he reportedly tried to harm himself. 
His injuries are thought to be superficial. 
The couple lived at the retirement home called Orpea El Campello, which is understood to function as a day centre as well as an OAP residence. The incident happened at a retirement home in the town of El Campello near Alicante (Photo: SOLARPIX.COM) 
A worker confirmed the victim was British and her husband had been arrested. 
She said: “They hadn’t been living here long.” 
Managers at the centre were today meeting with police who are investigating. Read More 
A spokesman for the local police confirmed: “The Civil Guard is investigating the death of a woman aged 79 who was allegedly attacked by her 86-year-old husband with a bladed weapon. 
“It happened around 9am this morning morning. Staff at the home are meeting with the police over the death today (Photo: SOLARPIX.COM) 
"The couple were living at a retirement home in the Muchavista Beach area of El Campello. 
“The man required medical treatment for injuries which are not thought to be serious.” Read More 
A source close to the inquiry added: “The injuries were self-inflicted and are superficial.” 
El Campello is a holiday resort lying between Alicante and Benidorm on the Costa Blanca. Like us on Facebook
